courses.title: Introduction to Programming
courses.description: This course provides an introduction to the fundamentals of programming.

tasks.name: Write a program to print 'Hello, World!'
Write a program to calculate the sum of two numbers
Declare and initialize variables of different data types
Write a program to convert temperature from Celsius to Fahrenheit

courses.title: Web Development Basics
courses.description: This course covers the basics of web development.

tasks.name: Create a basic HTML page with headings and paragraphs
Add images and links to an HTML page
Style HTML elements using CSS
Create a responsive layout using CSS Flexbox

courses.title: Python Programming
courses.description: This course focuses on learning Python programming language.

tasks.name: Write a Python program to find the factorial of a number
Write a Python program to check if a number is prime
Write a Python program to find the largest among three numbers
Write a Python program to check if a year is a leap year

courses.title: Database Management
courses.description: This course covers the basics of database management systems.

tasks.name: Create tables and define relationships in a relational database
Write SQL queries to retrieve data from a database
Normalize a given set of data into first, second, and third normal forms
Identify and resolve database anomalies

courses.title: Machine Learning Fundamentals
courses.description: This course introduces the basics of machine learning algorithms.

tasks.name: Implement a linear regression model in Python
Build a decision tree classifier for a given dataset
Cluster a dataset using K-means algorithm
Apply principal component analysis (PCA) to reduce dimensionality

courses.title: Cybersecurity Essentials
courses.description: This course provides an overview of cybersecurity concepts and practices.

tasks.name: Configure firewall settings to enhance network security
Implement secure communication using HTTPS protocol
Encrypt and decrypt messages using symmetric key cryptography
Generate digital signatures for authentication purposes
